name: JOURNEY TO THE ROOTS
description:
This is a story about four animals and their journey through the city to get back to nature.

We are 5 Italian first year game design/art students, we submitted this game to "My first game jam winter 2023".

New updates coming soon! 

Hope you enjoy this little interactive experience, if you have enjoyed this game, leave a comment ;)

It's necessary to set your monitor settings to 1920x1080 resolution and image scale to 100% before starting the game.
